title: Looking For a Coach
body:
Hello, I'm currently stuck in bronze I managed to climb out this season but after a break I fell back down, I don't consider myself one of the best players in bronze but I feel that I am a lot better than many I have seen, I'm hoping I can improve, climb out of bronze and my goal is to play in competitive games. So in conclusion I am asking if there is any one out there willing to teach me things I do not know and help me improve on the things I do.

IGN- Yasho

replies.body: Find one champion and master them. There;'s no shame in being a one-trick.

Alright, I searched through your match history.
Now keep in mind that I don't know the chat or whats been exactly done in these games.

Kassidin seems fine, apart from 1 game. (Your kass is great keep using it)
40 mins, 160 CS - Even KD_

Heim- did poor 240 CS for a 60 min game as heimer?
Needs to work on CSing and objectives as heimer.

"Support" Zilean has archangels, and abyssal.
No sight stone/support items, went full AP.

Some old Kass games have really poor CSing.

Champion roster is weird. You go from mid-support-ADC-top-jungle-mid-top-mid
Your all over the place so I'm assuming you go Mid then Fill. Which is't bad, but your mid kass is great might wanna go Mid-Top or something.

In some games your CSing is poor (Not most of your Kass games)
usually the minimum is 60 CS every 10 mins, the average is 80 CS per 10 mins.
Like that heimerdinger game you need to work on CSing a bit.

And your support builds need a lot of work.

Do what ever is working for you as kass as it seems to work.
Try focusing on objectives a bit more, kills are great but they don't win games.

I'm a free coach, I just got back form AVCON.

now I need to start saying this (Because of reasons)
I don't tolerate toxic behaviour.

But When I get home I can take a look.
look up "Helping Others Improve" on youtube and you should see some of my work.
